body:
Lever supports two separate HackerRank integrations: one for administering HackerRank tests to your candidates, and another for sourcing candidates directly into Lever from HackerRank. This article details how to set up the tests integration.

Step 1: Generate a Lever API key on your HackerRank for Work API settings page. Copy the API key by clicking the paper icon directly to the right of the long string of random characters.

Step 2: Find the "Interviewing" section on your integrations settings page in Lever.

Step 3: Enable the HackerRank integration, paste the API key from step 1 in the "Access token" field, and click "Done".

Now you can send your candidates a HackerRank test and view the results directly in Lever! Learn how to use the integration by reading this Lever support page.
title: Lever - Tests integration
